name: Go Go-Karts
description:
Go Go Karts is a 3D arcade multiplayer couch racer set in the Fable World amusement park. Race and drift your way through three unique tracks in a grand prix to decide once and for all who is the ultimate Fable World racer.

Go Go Karts is the result of SMU Guildhall's major second semester project for Team Game Production. It is the spectacular triumph that came out of tireless hard work, dedication, and the determination of students for whom much of this was new. Please, from our team to you, enjoy!
